title: My Pixel 2 XL, heating and shutting off itself. What should i do, need help.
content:
My Pixel 2 XL (Android version 9), always heating (CPU around 51 degree) and then shutting off itself. To get on again, i should push the "Power button + Vol Down" in the same time. But, after a while it will be heat again and a few minute a phone shutting off.

What should i do, need help.
